string.value: You can earn the #b<Mu Lung Explorer>#k title by exploring the Mu Lung Garden.
#b#eTitle -Mu Lung Explorer#k#n\r\nExplore the 10 main regions of Mu Lung Garden.\r\n#bâ— Status : #R27014# / 10 Completed.
You have earned the #b<Mu Lung Explorer>#k title for exploring various places in Mu Lung Garden.
You've finished exploring Mu Lung Garden. I will grant you the #b<Mu Lung Explorer>#k title.

How did you like exploring the Mu Lung Garden? If you've explored every inch of Mu Lung Garden, where the sage lives, you too may be able to become one in the future. Hahaha. I think you deserve the #b<Mu Lung Explorer>#k title. Job well done. Oh, and keep up the good work as you explore other parts of Maple World!

Oh, you haven't finished exploring. Come back after you further explore Mu Lung Garden. You must visit every corner of Mu Lung Garden, including the Mu Lung village, Herb Town, Red-Nose Pirate Den, etc. I'm sure you know which places are considered part of Mu Lung Garden and don't need me to spell out every region for you.
